description: This file provides a utility function for debouncing, which delays invoking a given function until after a specified wait period since the last invocation. It is used to improve performance for inputs that may trigger frequent events, such as user typing.

methods.name: debounce(fn, wait = 250)
methods.description: Creates a debounced version of a function that delays its execution until after `wait` milliseconds have elapsed since the last call.
